title: State of Decay Font
content:
I need the same or similar font of the logo "State of Decay", i much apreciate your help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/state-of-decay-logo1_4226.png)

Font: 

 ChunkFive 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [state-of-decay-logo1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625/http:/typophile.com/files/state-of-decay-logo1.png) | 129.85 KB |
author: The-Marker

comments.content:
Aha, new zombie game!  
The font is an early 19th century design now known as Egyptian.  
Two which would work fine are Sánchez Slab Black  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/sanchez-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/sanchez-slab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/sanchez-slab/")  
and Novecento Slab Wide UltraBold  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento-slab/")  
Don

Both close but the base font is definitely [ChunkFive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052625/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/ChunkFive) by The League of Moveable Type with a grunge/eroded/erased/roughen progressive text effect applied.
